data.eml:eml: Periclimenaeus pectinidactylus n. sp. (Crustacea: Decapoda: Pontoniinae) from the Belizean Barrier Reef, Caribbean Sea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Uriš, Zden Ě K Ď, Horká, Ivona, Sandford, Floyd (2009): Periclimenaeus pectinidactylus n. sp. (Crustacea: Decapoda: Pontoniinae) from the Belizean Barrier Reef, Caribbean Sea. Zootaxa 2130: 31-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.188350
